links.title: Tesla Model X: Where we're going, we don't need roads
links.description: I can conceive that in saner circumstances, Tesla Model X might never have come to be. But the strongest blades are forged in the hottest fires, and for those that survive the heat, something very special is born. Model X is special in a way that the automotive industry hasn't been able to conceive in a very long time.

links.title: How House Republicans Are Planning to Vote on the Obamacare Replacement
links.description: House Speaker Paul D. Ryan is still trying to build a majority to pass the Republican health care bill, which is scheduled for a vote in the House of Representatives on Thursday. The bill needs 216 votes to pass, and none of the Democrats in the House have said they would vote for it.

messages.body: $TSLA It's over for GM. It's dealerships will never really promote and want to sell electric vehicles. http://www.barrons.com/articles/teslas-handicap-now-looks-like-an-advantage-1490118735

links.title: Tesla's Handicap Now Looks Like an Advantage
links.description: Car dealers have widely different assumptions of how to price the Chevrolet Bolt, the electric vehicle from General Motors. And their uncertainty highlights an important advantage for Tesla - when you control your distribution, you also have more control over pricing.
